name: Giayee Technology Co. Ltd
overview:
Giayee Technology Co. Ltd, is a professional Android Phones and MIDs OEM/ODM, devoted to the R&D , Manufacture and International sales of Android Phones, Android MIDs & other Android Handheld devices. As an early adopter of Android based solution development, Giayee has worked as an ODM & OEM in offering turn-key design & development services from MD to Manufacture, bringing optimized Android-based products to market.

privide the solution as follow:

  • A8 Android Phones and MIDs OEM/ODM
  • R&D , Manufacture and International sales of Android Phones, Android MIDs & other Android Handheld devices
  • fully turn-key android solutions and best design services

Shenzhen Giayee technology Co. Ltd a leading company, specializing in Android tablet&mobile phone design, that mainly concentrates on the R&D, production and sales of Android mobile terminal.

HEAD OFFICE Luohu Science Building Room 401, #85 Taining Road, Shenzhen CHN 518020 TEL: +86 0755 25503354 R&D CENTER #195 Xiong Chu Avenue, Wuhan CHN 430079 TEL: +86 027 87751107 CUSTOMER SUPPORT Market EMAIL: market@giayee.com Website: http://www.giayee.com
